title: The Protector Book 3: Thriller Romance Series (The D'Azzo Family)
features: They have no reason to trust each other except they’re fighting the same evil.

Detective Nathan D’Azzo’s last conversation with his father lasted long enough for the cracking sound of a sniper’s bullet to hit its target. Now, Nathan hunts his father’s killer. Timothy Jarrett is the brains behind a massive gang alliance with his enforcer, Marcus Jacko. And between them is Olivia Weaver, a woman with a deep devotion for those she loves but a web of secrets a mile long. Nathan will bring them to their knees.Olivia wants two things, the cancerous tumor eating her mother alive eradicated and a place they both can disappear. She made that impossible. When a seemingly innocent man tries to save her life, she breaks her number one rule. Never get involved. She should have left Nathan D’Azzo, AKA Drew Parker, to the wolves. He’s one of them.When Nathan unravels pieces of Olivia’s life, his protective instincts jolt to the surface. Can he protect her while convincing her she can trust him … or will the evil closing in on them shatter their only chance at love, destroying everything in its path?
is the heart-stopping end to this dynamic romance suspense series. Grab your copy now and “plan to read long into the night.”
***While each book in The D’Azzo Family series is a standalone romance, the series is much more enjoyable to read in order.
description: "Thrilling, Suspenseful, Romance!Full of action and a new romance, the Protector delivers as much entertainment, thrills, and suspense as the two previous books. You have to love the D'Azzo family and their loyalty and commitment to one another."
"Fantastic story! WOW! Just WOW! This is the first book in the series I've read. So, now I have to go read all the previous ones. D'Azzo Justice League." -
"A wonderful ending to a great series. The D'Azzo family takes the word 'adventure' to a whole new level. Action, suspense and of course, a HEA romance." -

"Suspense, action, and great romance. Well written story with thrills and action that keep you turning the pages. A series that you can read again and again and still get captivated in the story. Highly, highly recommend." -

"Wow! What a spicy thriller this is.  The reader is drawn into the story from the first chapter. One gets to enjoy several adrenaline-packed action scenes, characters that evoke the reader's emotions, and a romance that breeds from an unlikely place."
Crown Heart for Excellence InD'tale Magazine
In the Shadow of Greed In the Shadow of EvilIn the Shadow of MaliceIn the Shadow of Pride Coming SoonIn the Shadow of Vengeance ComingHis One Wish--Novella Retelling
The Eyewitness Book 1 The Analyst Book 2 The Protector Book 3

Award Winning Author, Nancy C. Weeks writes romantic suspense novels that sometimes have a touch of the supernatural. Her characters stalk her dreams until she curls up with her laptop and creates riveting romantic suspense tales sure to have the most satisfying happily-ever-after. The best way to see who is keeping her awake at night is to check out her website at nancycweeks.com.
I highly recommend The D'Azzo Family series be read in order. While the romance element is complete in each book, the suspense element continues with a compelling conclusion in The Protector, Book 3.
